alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 10:32PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Bay, southeastern Walton and southern Washington Counties through 1100 PM EDT/1000 PM CDT/... At 1031 PM EDT/931 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Panama City Beach, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lynn Haven, Ebro, Nixon, Bayhead, Southport, Fountain, Seminole Hills, Singer Road, Recota Beach, Saunders, Bayou George, Greenhead, Camp Flowers, Bruce, Red Head, Gainer Spring, Bennett, Pine Log, Youngstown and Cairo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington
